doc.str: CLOTHING FEATURE EXTRACTION DEVICE, PERSON RETRIEVAL DEVICE, AND PROCESSING METHOD THEREOF

A "person region" is detected from a video image input from a surveillance camera, the direction of the person in the person region is assessed, separability of the clothing of the person is assessed so as to generate clothing portion separation information, and further, a clothing feature indicating a visual feature of the clothing of the person in the person region is extracted taking into account the person's direction and the clothing portion separation information. The direction of the person is assessed on the basis of the direction of the face of the person, the movement of the person, and the symmetric property of the clothing. The clothing portion separation information is generated on the basis of analysis information regarding the geometric configuration of the person region, and visible portion information which indicates the clothing portion of the person visualized by the person region and the background region. The person is retrieved on the basis of a matching result between a clothing query text which indicates a type and color of the clothing of the person and the extracted clothing feature of the person.
